title: Textile, 1800–1850
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt
description: Mezzaro in a multicolored design on a white ground. Center shows a large scale flowering tree flanked by a smaller tree on either side. Floral sprays, animals, insects, and birds are scattered over the ground. Border design is repeating horns with floral sprays.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1800–1850.
1800–1850. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt. 1931-4-3.
